title: Pull request merge from kdazzle/oauthlib:patch-1 to idan/oauthlib:master

text: @kdazzle thanks for adding this! What do you think about the long documentation in the code here? Would it be better suited in the /docs instead?

@ib-lundgren Hmm, I think you might be right about moving them into /docs. The code already has the list of methods and shows that they give NotImplementedErrors, so that documentation might be redundant where it is now. 

However, being able to find all things RequestValidator in one place is kind of nice.

Updated request_validator documentation to include credential-saving methods

There are methods in request_validator that must be implemented and that aren't listed in the class's documentation. Also fixed a couple of minor documentation typos.
